Address: 14701 CHARLSON ROAD, EDEN PRAIRIE, Minnesota, 55347, United States of America
CompanyDescription: C.H. Robinson Worldwide, Inc. ("C.H. Robinson," "the company," "we," "us," or "our") is one of the largest third party logistics companies in the world with consolidated total revenues of $15.3 billion in 2019. We provide freight transportation services and logistics solutions to companies of all sizes in a wide variety of industries. During 2019, we handled approximately 18 million shipments and worked with more than 119,000 customers. We operate through a network of offices in North America, Europe, Asia, Oceania, and South America. We have developed global transportation and distribution networks to provide transportation and supply chain services worldwide. As a result, we have the capability of facilitating most aspects of the supply chain on behalf of our customers. We have two reportable segments: North American Surface Transportation ("NAST") and Global Forwarding, with our remaining operating segments reported under All Other and Corporate.  ... More ...
